p: For the next generation sequencing experiment, single-cell suspensions were then pelleted and resuspended in FACS buffer containing the anti-EpCAM-PerCP/Cy5.5 (1:500, BioLegend ®, Clone: G8.8) for 20 min on ice. Cells were then washed twice in FACS buffer before being resuspended in FACS buffer containing DAPI (1:1000; Invitrogen) to discriminate dead cells. Stromal cells identified as DAPI -/GFP -/ EPCAM −and M6 cancer cells identified as DAPI −/ GFP +/EPCAM + were collected from at least five tumor specimens per treatment group.
